title: Paul Campbell (American actor)
text:
Paul Campbell (February 27, 1923 – March 17, 1999), was an American film actor. He appeared in over 30 films between <a href="1947%20in%20film">1947</a> and <a href="1959%20in%20film">1959</a>.
Campbell was best known for his work at <a href="Columbia%20Pictures">Columbia Pictures</a>, where he usually portrayed tall, handsome leading men of the <a href="Western%20%28genre%29">western</a> genre. Modern viewers will recognize him as Clarence Cassidy, the cowardly cowboy in <a href="The%20Three%20Stooges">The Three Stooges</a> film "<a href="Merry%20Mavericks">Merry Mavericks</a>".
Campbell died on March 17, 1999, in <a href="New%20York%20City">New York City</a>.
